name: simple weapon
description: The weapon carried by the prototype goblins

Notes: Description of fields
name: The name of this equipment as it appears in the game
description: A short description of this equipment
isHidden: TRUE if this equipment is invisible to the player
isDual: TRUE if this is actually two weapons, i.e. dual weilding
physical: amount of physical damage or defence this equipment provides
magical: amount of magical damage or defence this equipment provides
baseAP: Bonus action points granted by this equipment.  May be 0
baseMP: ditto
strength: ditto
intelligence: ditto
dexterity: ditto
guard: ditto
spirit: ditto
vitality: ditto.  Actually, this one could be problematic
abilities: Extra abilities granted by this equipment.  Can be empty.  For more than one ability, separate with commas
class: The allowed classes are WEAPON, ARMOUR, and OTHER
category: This will eventually determine which characters can equip which equipment.
